name: Elegant Dye
flavorText: The bright magenta colors of the Hezna flower are always a favorite amongst the fashionable elite of Caldeum.
flavorTextHtml: The bright magenta colors of the Hezna flower are always a favorite amongst the fashionable elite of Caldeum.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
